title: Exorcist II The Heretic (1977)  [H.264-MP4] (oan)
description:
Movies : Horror : DVD Rip : English


Exorcist II: The Heretic is a 1977 American horror film and the sequel to the 1973 film The
Exorcist. It was directed by John Boorman who also co-wrote the screenplay with William
Goodhart from an original story by Rospo Pallenberg. The author of the "The Exorcist",
William Peter Blatty, was not involved in the production, and received credit only for creation
of the characters.

Plot

Father Philip Lamont (Richard Burton), who is struggling with his faith, is assigned by the
Cardinal (Paul Henreid) to investigate the death of Father Merrin (Max Von Sydow), who had
been killed in the course of exorcising the Assyrian demon Pazuzu from Regan MacNeil
(Linda Blair). While Lamont, who's had some experience at exorcism, thinks of Merrin as a
saint, he is actually up on posthumous heresy charges. Some Church authorities are not sure
the exorcism should have been performed (even though it was officially approved by the local
Bishop) Merrins writings are considered very controversial. Apparently, Church authorities
are trying to modernize and do not want to acknowledge that Satan (in terms of an actual evil
entity) exists.
